song.title: The Earth's Last Defender Theme
song.info: By: Killer Fish (Todd Showalter) of Late Nite Software Labs -------------------------------- Written on or about Mar/94. (c) This song is dedicated to my abiding obsession with Japanese Anime. Don't ask me what the two have to do with each other. Anyways, enjoy the music, and I would like to appologize in advance for any disco-like stuff in the song. It's not my fault, really. Blame someone else. I said that I would eventually deliver an ULT file that was wider than 10 channels, and here it is. Don't bug me about the quality, that wasn't part of the deal. I'll work on making the the next one sound better. If you're looking for a really good sample for making chords, get a copy of the sample called "Polysynth Lead I", above. Its really quite good to work with, and it is devoid of irritating harmonics, so chords don't sound odd with it. Well, I'm just about out of scrawling space, so I'll sign off now. Gotta speed, keid...
